您作为创作者将获得的所有未来销售额的百分比: Percentage of profits of sales in the future you will receive as the creator
恭喜您发行成功！: Congratulations on the success of your release!
请确认是否购买，购买成功将成功该NFT的拥有者: Please confirm whether to bid. You will be the owner of this NFT if you confirm the bid
请确认是否取消拍卖: Please confirm if you want to cancel the auction
请确认是否取消售价: Please confirm whether to cancel the selling price
选择拍卖使用的代币,一旦有用户开始竞拍你的商品,将会开启24小时倒计时,拍卖无法: Select the token used for the auction. Once a user starts bidding on your item, a 24 hour countdown will start, and the auction cannot be cancelled. The bidder who offers the highest price before the end of the countdown will get the item.
请输入最低加价幅度: Please enter the minimum bid increase
下一次加价必须比最高价高: The next bid must be higher than the highest price
未检测到钱包，请下载最新钱包插件并开启钱包插件: No wallet detected, please download the latest wallet extension and open it.
每次售出您将获得售价的: For every sale, you will receive % of the selling price.
一旦行成功将无法修改；: You cannot edit the item once it is released；
本次上传需要支付一定数量的XWC用于支付存储及网络带宽费用，由于是内测阶段将免费: You have to pay a certain amount of XWC to cover storage and network bandwidth costs for this upload. As it is in the alpha test, this upload will be free of charge.
设置你想出售的代币和金额: Set the token and amount you want to sell
未检测到钱包，请到钱包插件检查钱包节点: No wallet detected. Please go to wallet extension and check wallet node.
不能低于最低加价: The price should be greater than the minimum increment.
长度在20个字符内: Your input should be shorter than 20 characters.
长度在1000个字符内: Your input should be shorter than 1,000 characters.
版权费百分比不能大于20: The copyright fee cannot be greater than 20 percent.
上传文件最大20M: The uploaded file should be less than 20M.
请使用formData格式请求此接口: Please use formData for this interface request
不支持此类型的文件: This type of file is not supported
文件已经被别人发行过了: The file has already been released by someone else.
转移了这个NFT: Transferred the ownership of this NFT
上传出现异常:上传失败,请选择文件: An exception occurred in uploading: Upload failed, please select file
更改了这个NFT的售价: Changed the price of this NFT
设置了这个NFT的售价: Set the price of this NFT
取消了这个NFT的售价: Canceled the price of this NFT
您的余额不足,手续费需要0.01XWC: Insufficient balance. You have to pay 0.01 XWC for service fee.
